title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - FitGirl
description:
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt (v1.08.2 + 16 DLC, DRM-Free, MULTI14) [FitGirl Repack. Selective Download - from 17.5 GB]


::Information::


Release Date: May 18, 2015
Genres/Tags: RPG, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Developer: CD Projekt RED
Publisher: CD Projekt RED
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: REDengine 3
Steam User Rating: 94% of user reviews are positive (based on 18,350 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Arabic, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese
Audio Language: English, French, German, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Japanese
Crack: not required, DRM-free from GOG


::Repack Features::


Based on GOG.com Preload non-scene release (23,566,843,640 bytes)
Patches v1.01 + v1.08.2 applies
All 16 DLCs added
Voiceovers language packs as optional downloads
MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Ready for official GOG patches, registy entries recreated (open "Registry Fixreadme.txt" after game installation if registry entries weren't created in your case)
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed to 17.5 GB for any given language)
Installation takes 35-50 minutes (depending on your system & selected languages)
HDD space after installation: 31~49 GB (depending on selected language packs)
Repack by FitGirl
